name: html-inflect
description: Cleanup, modify, and save messy HTML

scripts.build: browserify index.js > dist/html-inflect.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] -s Inflect
scripts.minify: browserify -g uglifyify index.js > dist/html-inflect.min.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] -s Inflect
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && npm run build && npm run minify

author: Evan Yamanishi
